resources.string: I secured the mnemonic phrase and I have read the ToS
A new transaction has just arrived in your wallet.

string-array.name: fee_target_summaries
string-array.item: Confirmation in 3 blocks, up to 30 minutes on average
Buying diamonds in a dark alley? ;-)\nConfirmation in 6 blocks, up to one hour on average
Confirmation in 12 blocks, up to two hours on average
We know each other, I\'ll take my time.\nConfirmation in 24 blocks or later, 4 hours or longer on average
The truth is out there, the network will decide\n10000 satoshi/kB

string-array.name: fee_target_summaries_ga
string-array.item: Confirmation in 3 blocks, up to 30 minutes on average
Confirmation in 6 blocks, up to one hour on average
Confirmation in 12 blocks, up to two hours on average
Confirmation in 24 blocks or later, 4 hours or longer on average

resources.string: Custom fees require transaction replacement functionality to be enabled.
The feerate was corrected to the minimum rate of %1$d sat/kB
Rate must be empty or greater than %1$d.
You MUST save this mnemonic phrase NOW
the easier, safer and faster bitcoin wallet
Invalid PIN, you don\'t have any attempts left. Please login using your mnemonic phrase.
Invalid PIN, you have %1$d attempts left
Be aware, other apps can read or change the clipboard
Type your mnemonic phrase or scan its QR Code
The entered amount is too small to send
Please follow the instructions on your Hardware Wallet
Please re-connect your hardware wallet before trying again.
Cerating a new GreenAddress wallet, please wait…
Please provide your Hardware Wallet PIN. Look at the device for number positions:
Please provide your Hardware Wallet mnemonic phrase.
Outdated Hardware Wallet firmware. Please upgrade to the latest firmware from your computer.
Outdated Hardware Wallet firmware. Please upgrade to at least 1.6 at https:/mytrezor.com/ from your computer.
Ledger Dashboard detected, please open the Bitcoin app to access.
Invalid PIN. Remaining attempts: %1$d. Please re-connect your hardware wallet before trying again.
BTChip is not set up. Please set it up using a desktop client to be able to use it.
Transaction not confirmed. Please wait for block confirmations to gain trust in this transaction.
Transaction not verified. Please wait for synchronization to gain trust in this transaction. Remaining blocks:
Your balance is not confirmed. Either you have some unconfirmed incoming transactions, or SPV verification has not finished.
SPV is not used and its settings cannot be changed in watch only mode.
Displays the progress of SPV synchronization

Simple Payment Verification allows trusting your transactions and balance thanks to synchronization with Bitcoin network. It adds bandwidth and processing requirements, so you may want to switch it off if on poor connections or low end phones.

SPV is always synchronized on non mobile networks like WiFi or Ethernet. This setting also synchronizes when using mobile data. This can be expensive depending on your data plan so take care when enabling.
You don\'t have two factor authentication!\nPlease go to settings to set it up!
You only have one two factor authentication method set up!\nPlease add another in settings as a backup in case you lose access.
For your safety, go to settings to set an email address up
The camera has a problem. You probably need to restart the device.

First, you need to provide an authentication code from some of your already set up two factor authentication methods. This is to prevent malicious users from changing your 2FA settings without your consent.
Select existing 2FA method to authenticate setting up a new one:
You need to provide one code from your new Google Authenticator. You can obtain it by scanning the QR code below in the Google Authenticator app.
Please provide your Google Authenticator code.
Providing an email enables transactions recovery and notifications
You will need to finish this process, otherwise you won\'t receive recovery data
You will need recovery data to recover the funds if the service provider GreenAddress will cancel the service without notice
All the emails will be sent by the service provider GreenAddress
You need to provide the confirmation code to make sure you have access to the new two factor authentication method. After you providing the code, the method will be enabled.
You need to provide the confirmation code to make sure you have access to the new email address. After you providing the code, the email address will be enabled.
You need to provide existing two factor authentication code. This is to prevent malicious users from changing your 2FA settings without your consent.
Or you can use the following code (touch to copy) : %1$s. Remember to back it up!
Only connect to trusted node[s] for SPV
Please enter a valid .onion or IP address. (.onion preferred)
Connecting to Tor (.onion) nodes allows maximum privacy and security. If you choose to continue, please press "OK".
You need to enable the proxy configuration (Orbot Socks5) first to enable Tor.
If you increase the fee now to the recommended level, the transaction will be expected to confirm after %1$d blocks.
If you increase the fee now to the recommended level, the transaction will be expected to confirm after 1 block.
\'%1$s\' is an invalid word, do you want it corrected to %2$s?
PINs do not match, please try again.
Unable to contact the GreenAddress service. Please check your network connection and wait to be reconnected.
Please enable camera permissions to use sweep functionality.
Please enable camera permissions to use verify paperwallet functionality.
Please enable camera permissions to use scan functionality.
You must first logout before signing in.
Invalid mnemonic phrase (must be 24 or 27 words)
PIN has to be between 4 and 15 digits
Are you sure you want to send to block explorer %1$s the details?
User not found or invalid password
Tor will use %1$s and only work if your proxy is Orbot or Tor enabled
This hides the Bitcoin balance from elsewhere and always shows it in the title instead of the subaccount name
Warning: The username will be saved on device
Saving the username on the device can be dangerous; if someone can access your memory they will have access to your username in clear text. If you choose to continue, please press "OK".
Enable advanced network fee options, network status monitor menu and various user interface options for more expert users
GreenBits is unable to connect, please verify your internet connection
Hold your NFC tag close to the device
Please secure your mnemonic phrase and confirm you agree to the Terms of Service
You are not connected, please wait
PIN has to be between 4 and 15 long
Your transactions will appear here as soon as you start using Altana
Are you sure to send all your bitcoin?
Show amount fields in receive tab
Use fiat values, in your current currency, separated by space. Example: "10 20.5 50 100 200"
No enough money in your pocket
You must enable Two Factor Authentication before you can change the threshold.
Invoice not found, try payment again
Invalid payment URL, try payment again
Impossible to verify the service "%s". Continue anyway?
Please sign the message acknowledgement on your hardware wallet
You have unacknowledged system messages. Please log in again to view them.
You have unacknowledged system messages. Please use a full control login to view them.
I confirm I have read and understood the above message
WARNING: Resetting two factor authentication will lock your wallet

After entering and confirming a new email address, the wallet will be placed into a locked down state for a period of 12 months plus any remaining nlocktime. During this time you will not be able to transact or generate new addresses. Once the lockout period expires, the email address you enter here will be enabled as your two factor email address.
You will need to confirm your email in the next step.
WARNING: There is already a request to reset twofactor for your wallet. If you now request with a new email address, your wallet will become disputed and likely permanently unavailable to you.
WARNING: There is already a request to reset twofactor for your wallet. If you click OK, your wallet will become disputed and likely permanently unavailable to you.
WARNING: Wallet locked for two factor reset in %d days. Contact support for more information.
WARNING: Wallet locked by two factor dispute. Contact support for more information.
Reset successful, your wallet is now locked.
Reset cancelled, your wallet is now unlocked.
Choose and don\'t ask me again
One network must be selected. Selecting Bitcoin by default
Custom network with this name already present
Custom network added, enable it in the network selector chooser
Cannot remove enabled network, please disable first
Add custom network by QR code
This operation may take several seconds…
Are you sure you want to sweep all funds (%s) from the address below?
Are you sure you want to sweep all funds from the password protected BIP38 key below?
The funds within the paperwallet have not yet been confirmed.\nPlease confirm and try again later>
You can sell your bitcoins via the sale page in the dropdown menu
Warning, the wallet on the device will be reset on error and will be necessary your mnemonic phrase to restore it.
wants to authenticate via BitID protocol. Do you want to sign the request?
Warning: the communication will be via unsecured http connection. For sensitive data, https should be used.
Create accounts that allow you to separate your funds. Each account will have its own receiving addresses.
Export your mnemonic phrase with password via QR Code or tag NFC
Creating backup with password in progress…
Password must be at least %d characters long
Problem with Android\'s authentication, fallback to manual PIN
Problem with Android\'s authentication, please restore your wallet with mnemonic phrase
Now to reuse Android\'s authentication you need to set a PIN. Insert new pin to continue.
You can\'t change your email address while you have email 2FA enabled
The setted up email address is
You will receive now an email with transactions recovery. After every transaction (sent and received) you will receive by email the updated version of transactions recovery. Do not delete them
You will need recovery data only if the service provider GreenAddress will cancel the service without notice
RBF (transaction replacement) is required on economic network fee and will be enabled for this transition

The following mnemonic phrase will be required to restore your bitcoin wallet in the future.\n\nWrite down the phrase in a secure place, if you lose it you won\'t be able to restore your wallet and all your bitcoins will be lost.
Focus a qr code in the rectangle to scan it
We suggest you export the mnemonic phrase to QR Code or NFC tag.
We suggest you set an email to further secure your bitcoins.
Mario still had to backup his wallet when the smartphone broke and has now lost all bitcoins.
Anna has instead recovered all her bitcoins because she had already made a backup, before the smartphone fell in the water.\nAnna is smart.
Follow Anna\'s example, backup your wallet now!
You need to backup your wallet as soon as possible to avoid losing your bitcoins.
We know it\'s boring but, please, read the terms of service before using Altana.
I have read and accept the terms of service
If this device is damaged, lost, replaced or Altana is removed, NO ONE will be able to recover your bitcoins without the backup.\n\nDo you want to skip anyway?
Hold your NFC tag close to the device

By using inbitcoin products, software, services or web sites you agree to the following terms and conditions.

The information contained in this website is for general information purposes only. The information is provided by inbitcoin srl and while we endeavor to keep the information up to date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

In no event will we be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website.

Every effort is made to keep the website up and running smoothly. However, inbitcoin srl takes no responsibility for, and will not be liable for, the website or GreenAddressIT Ltd services being temporarily unavailable due to technical issues beyond our control.

inbitcoin srl takes no responsibility for and will not be liable for any financial loss arising from the use of our wallet including any of the following.

Financial loss due to wallet data being "Brute-forced".

Financial loss due to server failure or data loss.

Financial loss due to server hacks or unavailability.

Financial loss due to forgotten mnemonics.

Financial loss due to corrupted data on our servers.

Financial loss due to incorrectly constructed transactions or mistyped bitcoin addresses.

Financial loss due to "phishing" or other websites masquerading as greenaddress or inbitcoin.

inbitcoin srl does not pretend to be a bank or regulated financial institution. Any Bitcoin stored using inbitcoin srl wallet are not in inbitcoin srl control we simply provide an interface to access GreenAddressIT Ltd services. inbitcoin srl does not have control over or take any responsibility for any transactions made through our wallet.

This website refers to virtual currency only. Bitcoin are credit vouchers of which inbitcoin or GreenAddressIT Ltd are not the issuer. inbitcoin srl makes no guarantees that bitcoins can be redeemed at the purchase price. Any exchange rates displayed are provided by 3rd party services and are not indicative of the Bitcoin being backed by any commodity or other form of money or having any other tangible value at all.

inbitcoin wallet ( altana bitcoin wallet ) use the smartphone camera to read qr code.
The next screen will show your mnemonic phrase. Make sure you are in a secure place, far from prying eyes.
